title: Auto Replay system!
body: Always have been thinking why Riot has not made a replay system for the game, would be wonderful to re-live the wonderful/dreadful moments of league of legends.

replies.body: na.op.gg has a replay system if LoLRecorder/baron replays/ whatever other recording program won't work. Personally I use NA.OP.GG exclusively now, simply click while game loads and I have a recorded game available 5min after it ends
Wow, thanks so much. ive been looking for something like this
Yeah I only know those 3, used to know a stupid amount more, google league of legends recorder and I am sure you can find some that will work for your PC
